Class CashierActionBarController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.cashier.sharedComponents.CashierActionBarController
public class CashierActionBarController extends Object
Controller class for the action bar in the cashier section of the application. This class handles the navigation between stages of the cashier process, such as movie selection, session selection, seat selection, and customer details.

  • Method Details

    • validateCurrentStage

      private boolean validateCurrentStage()
      Validates if the current stage has valid data to proceed. The validation logic varies depending on the stage of the cashier process.
      Returns:
      true if the current stage is valid, false otherwise.

    • updateButtonStates

      public void updateButtonStates(int currentStage)
      Updates the states of the action buttons (Back and Next) based on the current stage. The back button is disabled on the first stage, and the next button is disabled if the current stage is not valid.
      Parameters:
      currentStage - The index of the current stage in the cashier process.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(CashierController controller)
      Sets the main controller for the action bar.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main controller of the cashier process.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the action bar by setting the button states.

    • handleCancel

      private void handleCancel()
      Handles the cancel action by displaying a confirmation dialog. If confirmed, the transaction is reset and all progress is lost.

    • handleBack

      private void handleBack()
      Handles the back action by navigating to the previous stage. The button state is updated after the stage change.

    • handleNext

      private void handleNext()
      Handles the next action by navigating to the next stage. The current stage is validated before proceeding to the next stage.
